participant_1.background:
My vintage cars are my pride and joy.
i like rap music.
i like taking pictures.
i am 25 years old and live with my parents.
i am dumpy.

participant_2.background:
I love to sing in my free time, it's my passion and I dream of making it big one day.
i own many cars.
I created the mobile that hangs above my baby's crib.
I have kids, and we enjoy spending time together.
i work as a bartender.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing good as well. Just taking some pictures of my vintage cars.
Oh, that's awesome! I love taking pictures too. What kind of vintage cars do you have?
I have a 1969 Chevy Camaro, a 1972 Ford Mustang, and a 1970 Dodge Challenger.
Wow, those are all beautiful cars! I'm especially jealous of the Camaro.
Thanks! They're a lot of fun to drive.
I bet! Do you have any plans for them in the future?
Not really, I just like to keep them in good condition and drive them around every once in a while.
That's cool. I'm sure they'll appreciate it.
Thanks! I hope so too.
So, what else do you like to do?
I like to listen to rap music, and I like to hang out with my friends.
Oh, cool! I love rap music too. What are some of your favorite artists?
I like Kendrick Lamar, J. Cole, and Drake.
Nice! I love Kendrick Lamar and J. Cole too. I'm not a big fan of Drake, but I can respect his talent.
Yeah, he's not for everyone. But I think he's a great artist.
Well, it sounds like we have a lot in common. It was nice meeting you!
You too! Have a nice day!
You too!
